listing_by_number.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'callflow' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; for (var i in doc.numbers) emit(doc.numbers[i], null); }

listing_by_hotdesk.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_deleted || !doc.hotdesk) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc.hotdesk.id, 'pin': doc.hotdesk.pin, 'require_pin': doc.hotdesk.require_pin , 'keep_logged_elsewhere': doc.hotdesk.keep_logged_elsewhere}); }
